name: @yoddaa/docker-mongodb
description: This repository provides an easy-to-use **Docker Compose setup** for running **MongoDB** with **Mongo Express**. The setup allows you to spin up a **MongoDB database** along with a **web-based UI** for easy database management. Configuration values are loaded dynamically from a `.env` file for flexibility.
author: Mohit Aneja <mohitaneja@gmail.com>
